hi...

we're looking at heritrix and it's possible uses as a crawling/spidering
application. we're considering an application that would have to parse
various university/college sites for registrar information.

as such, we basically would know prior to searching what the various
tags/text for a given element would be that we want to extract the
information for. we're curious as to whether heritrix might be able to be
easily modified for this kind of purpose. we haven't yet had an opportunity
to get into the docs/code to really look at what it does.

to be frank, we're looking for a solution that would allow us to not have to
write unique perl scripts/parsers for each site!

if there is someone who's familiar with this app that we could talk to, we
would greatly appreciate a short conversation to get a better understanding
of what the app does, and how it works.

regards,

bruce douglas
bedouglas@...
